title: About
text:
I’m a compiler engineer at NVIDIA, working on compilation of large language models to domain-specific architectures for inference acceleration.
I received my PhD in Computer Science from Aarhus University, Denmark, where I worked on modular specification and formal verification of distributed systems using separation logic and the Roc proof assistant.
My interests are in the areas of programming languages, compilers, and formal verification.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
